Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Board extends Object implements Serializable
A class that represents a Board. This class contains the Item Cards the player can pick from.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(int numberOfPlayers)
      Creates a new Board with a layout based on the number of players.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - the number of players by which the board layout is chosen.

  • Method Details

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid(int row, int column) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Gets whether the tile at the provided position is valid or not.
      Parameters:
      row - must be between boundaries (provided in the Constants file).
      column - must be between boundaries (provided in the Constants file).
      Returns:
      true if the tile at the provided position is valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • setTile

      public void setTile(ItemCard itemCard, int row, int column) throws IllegalArgumentException, IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Inserts the provided ItemCard in the tile at the provided position.
      Parameters:
      itemCard - the Item Card to be inserted or null.
      row - must be between boundaries (provided in the Constants file).
      column - must be between boundaries (provided in the Constants file).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException
      IndexOutOfBoundsException

    • peekCard

      public ItemCard peekCard(int row, int column) throws IllegalArgumentException, IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Gets the card at the given position without removing it.
      Parameters:
      row - must be between boundaries (provided in the Constants file).
      column - must be between boundaries (provided in the Constants file).
      Returns:
      the card on the selected tile, without removing it, or null if the tile is empty.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException
      IndexOutOfBoundsException

    • popCard

      public ItemCard popCard(int row, int column) throws IllegalArgumentException, IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Gets the card at the given position removing it.
      Parameters:
      row - must be between boundaries (provided in the Constants file).
      column - must be between boundaries (provided in the Constants file).
      Returns:
      the card on the selected tile, removing it, or null if the tile is empty.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException
      IndexOutOfBoundsException

    • getLayout

      public boolean[][] getLayout()
      Gets the layout of the board.
      Returns:
      the matrix that represents the valid tiles.

    • getTiles

      public ItemCard[][] getTiles()
      Gets the Item Cards on the board.
      Returns:
